MSSQL.Playerchecker: SELECT TOP (100) c.sid AS Player_ID, c.name AS Player_Name, c.account AS Account, c.lv AS [Level], ISNULL(sr.value, '') AS Job_Name, CASE WHEN c.login_time IS NOT NULL AND (c.logout_time IS NULL OR c.logout_time < c.login_time) THEN 'ONLINE' ELSE 'OFFLINE' END AS Online_Status FROM [{{TelecasterName}}].dbo.Character AS c LEFT JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.JobResource AS jr ON c.job = jr.id LEFT JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.{{StringResource}} AS sr ON jr.text_id = sr.code ORDER BY c.sid DESC;
MSSQL.PlayercheckerByAccount: SELECT TOP (500) c.sid AS Player_ID, c.name AS Player_Name, c.account AS Account, c.lv AS [Level], ISNULL(sr.value, '') AS Job_Name, CASE WHEN c.login_time IS NOT NULL AND (c.logout_time IS NULL OR c.logout_time < c.login_time) THEN 'ONLINE' ELSE 'OFFLINE' END AS Online_Status FROM [{{TelecasterName}}].dbo.Character AS c LEFT JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.JobResource AS jr ON c.job = jr.id LEFT JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.{{StringResource}} AS sr ON jr.text_id = sr.code WHERE c.account LIKE @SearchTerm ORDER BY c.slot ASC;
MSSQL.Summons: SELECT id.[id] AS Summon_ID, n.[value] AS Summon_Name, sn.[value] AS Card_Name FROM dbo.{{SummonResource}} AS id LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} AS n ON id.[name_id] = n.[code] LEFT JOIN dbo.{{ItemResource}} AS ir ON id.[card_id] = ir.[id] LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} AS sn ON ir.[name_id] = sn.[code] WHERE id.[form] = 1 AND id.[is_riding_only] = 0 ORDER BY id.[id] ASC;
MSSQL.Skills: SELECT id.[id] AS Skill_id, n.[value] AS Skillname FROM dbo.{{SkillResource}} AS id LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} AS n ON id.text_id = n.code ORDER BY Skill_id ASC;
MSSQL.Items: SELECT i.id AS Item_ID, s.[value] AS Name_EN FROM dbo.{{ItemResource}} i INNER JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} AS s ON i.name_id = s.code ORDER BY Item_ID ASC;
MSSQL.PlayerInventory: SELECT i.code AS Item_ID, ISNULL(sr.value, 'Unknown') AS Item_Name, i.cnt AS [Count], i.level AS [Level], i.enhance AS Enhance, i.wear_info, i.awaken_sid, i.random_option_sid, i.summon_code FROM [{{TelecasterName}}].dbo.Item AS i INNER JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.ItemResource AS ir ON i.code = ir.id INNER JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.{{StringResource}} AS sr ON ir.name_id = sr.code WHERE i.owner_id = @OwnerId ORDER BY i.code ASC;
MSSQL.PlayercheckerByCharName: SELECT TOP (500) c.sid AS Player_ID, c.name AS Player_Name, c.account AS Account, c.lv AS [Level], ISNULL(sr.value, '') AS Job_Name, CASE WHEN c.login_time IS NOT NULL AND (c.logout_time IS NULL OR c.logout_time < c.login_time) THEN 'ONLINE' ELSE 'OFFLINE' END AS Online_Status FROM [{{TelecasterName}}].dbo.Character AS c LEFT JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.JobResource AS jr ON c.job = jr.id LEFT JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.{{StringResource}} AS sr ON jr.text_id = sr.code WHERE c.name LIKE @SearchTerm ORDER BY c.lv DESC;
MSSQL.PlayerWarehouse: SELECT i.code AS Item_ID, ISNULL(sr.value, 'Unknown') AS Item_Name, i.cnt AS [Count], i.level AS [Level], i.enhance AS Enhance, i.wear_info, i.awaken_sid, i.random_option_sid, i.summon_code FROM [{{TelecasterName}}].dbo.Item AS i INNER JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.ItemResource AS ir ON i.code = ir.id INNER JOIN [{{ArcadiaName}}].dbo.{{StringResource}} AS sr ON ir.name_id = sr.code WHERE i.owner_id = (SELECT TOP 1 a.id FROM [{{AuthName}}].dbo.Account AS a WHERE a.name = @AccountName) ORDER BY i.code ASC;
MSSQL.NPC: SELECT [id] AS NPC_id, (n.[value] + ' ' + n2.[value]) AS npc_title, [x], [y], [contact_script] FROM dbo.{{NpcResource}} nid LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} n ON nid.[text_id] = n.[code] LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} n2 ON nid.[name_text_id] = n2.[code] ORDER BY [id] ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS;
MSSQL.States: SELECT sr.state_id, n.[value] AS buff_name FROM dbo.{{StateResource}} sr LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} n ON sr.text_id = n.code ORDER BY sr.state_id ASC;
MSSQL.Monsters: SELECT id.[id], n.[value] AS [name], id.[level], v.[value] AS [location] FROM dbo.{{MonsterResource}} id LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} n ON id.[name_id] = n.[code] LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} v ON id.[location_id] = v.[code] ORDER BY id.[id] ASC;

MySQL.Playerchecker: SELECT c.sid AS Player_ID, c.name AS Player_Name, c.account AS Account, c.lv AS Level, IFNULL(sr.value, '') AS Job_Name, CASE WHEN c.login_time IS NOT NULL AND (c.logout_time IS NULL OR c.logout_time < c.login_time) THEN 'ONLINE' ELSE 'OFFLINE' END AS Online_Status FROM `{{TelecasterName}}`.`Character` AS c LEFT JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`JobResource` AS jr ON c.job = jr.id LEFT JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`{{StringResource}}` AS sr ON jr.text_id = sr.code ORDER BY c.sid DESC LIMIT 100;
MySQL.PlayercheckerByAccount: SELECT c.sid AS Player_ID, c.name AS Player_Name, c.account AS Account, c.lv AS Level, IFNULL(sr.value, '') AS Job_Name, CASE WHEN c.login_time IS NOT NULL AND (c.logout_time IS NULL OR c.logout_time < c.login_time) THEN 'ONLINE' ELSE 'OFFLINE' END AS Online_Status FROM `{{TelecasterName}}`.`Character` AS c LEFT JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`JobResource` AS jr ON c.job = jr.id LEFT JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`{{StringResource}}` AS sr ON jr.text_id = sr.code WHERE c.account LIKE @SearchTerm ORDER BY c.slot ASC LIMIT 500;
MySQL.Summons: SELECT s.id AS Summon_ID, sn.value AS Summon_Name, cn.value AS Card_Name FROM `{{SummonResource}}` s LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` sn ON s.name_id = sn.code LEFT JOIN `{{ItemResource}}` ir ON s.card_id = ir.id LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` cn ON ir.name_id = cn.code WHERE s.form = 1 AND s.is_riding_only = 0 ORDER BY s.id ASC;
MySQL.Skills: SELECT s.id AS Skill_id, n.value AS Skillname FROM `{{SkillResource}}` s LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n ON s.text_id = n.code ORDER BY Skill_id ASC;
MySQL.Items: SELECT i.id AS Item_ID, s.value AS Name_EN FROM `{{ItemResource}}` i INNER JOIN `{{StringResource}}` s ON i.name_id = s.code ORDER BY Item_ID ASC;
MySQL.PlayerInventory: SELECT i.code AS Item_ID, IFNULL(sr.value, 'Unknown') AS Item_Name, i.cnt AS Count, i.level AS Level, i.enhance AS Enhance, i.wear_info, i.awaken_sid, i.random_option_sid, i.summon_code FROM `{{TelecasterName}}`.`Item` AS i INNER JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`ItemResource` AS ir ON i.code = ir.id INNER JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`{{StringResource}}` AS sr ON ir.name_id = sr.code WHERE i.owner_id = @OwnerId ORDER BY i.code ASC;
MySQL.PlayercheckerByCharName: SELECT c.sid AS Player_ID, c.name AS Player_Name, c.account AS Account, c.lv AS Level, IFNULL(sr.value, '') AS Job_Name, CASE WHEN c.login_time IS NOT NULL AND (c.logout_time IS NULL OR c.logout_time < c.login_time) THEN 'ONLINE' ELSE 'OFFLINE' END AS Online_Status FROM `{{TelecasterName}}`.`Character` AS c LEFT JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`JobResource` AS jr ON c.job = jr.id LEFT JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`{{StringResource}}` AS sr ON jr.text_id = sr.code WHERE c.name LIKE @SearchTerm ORDER BY c.lv DESC LIMIT 500;
MySQL.PlayerWarehouse: SELECT i.code AS Item_ID, IFNULL(sr.value, 'Unknown') AS Item_Name, i.cnt AS Count, i.level AS Level, i.enhance AS Enhance, i.wear_info, i.awaken_sid, i.random_option_sid, i.summon_code FROM `{{TelecasterName}}`.`Item` AS i INNER JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`ItemResource` AS ir ON i.code = ir.id INNER JOIN `{{ArcadiaName}}`.`{{StringResource}}` AS sr ON ir.name_id = sr.code WHERE i.owner_id = (SELECT a.id FROM `{{AuthName}}`.`Account` AS a WHERE a.name = @AccountName LIMIT 1) ORDER BY i.code ASC;
MySQL.NPC: SELECT nrc.id AS NPC_id, CONCAT_WS(' ', n1.value, n2.value) AS npc_title, nrc.x, nrc.y, nrc.contact_script FROM `{{NpcResource}}` nrc LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n1 ON nrc.text_id = n1.code LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n2 ON nrc.name_text_id = n2.code ORDER BY nrc.id ASC;
MySQL.States: SELECT sr.state_id, n.value AS buff_name FROM `{{StateResource}}` sr LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n ON sr.text_id = n.code ORDER BY sr.state_id ASC;
MySQL.Monsters: SELECT m.id, n.value AS name, m.level, v.value AS location FROM `{{MonsterResource}}` m LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n ON m.name_id = n.code LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` v ON m.location_id = v.code ORDER BY m.id ASC;
